name: BirthdayTracker
0:
”Alexa, ask birthday tracker to add Mom's birthday”
”Alexa, ask birthday tracker when Mom's birthday is?”
”Alexa, ask birthday tracker whose birthday is next month”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: birthday tracker
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Birthday tracker allows you to keep track of your friend's and family's birthday. Simply tell birthday tracker the birthday of somebody you know, then ask for it when you need it most.

------------------------------------
Adding a Birthday
------------------------------------

To add a birthday, simply say:

- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker to add [name's] birthday"

Tip: Remember to replace [name] with the name of the person you want to add

------------------------------------
Retrieving a Birthday
------------------------------------

To retrieve a birthday you have stored, simply say:

- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker when [name's] birthday is?"

------------------------------------
Other Things to Try
------------------------------------

Example phrases:

- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker who has a birthday in July"
- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker whose birthday is next?"
- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker how long until [name's] birthday"
- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker how many days until [name's] birthday"
- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker what day [name's] birthday is"
- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker what day [name's] birthday was in 1980"
- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker what day [name's] birthday will be on in 2050"
- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker what is [name's] zodiac sign"
- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker to get all my birthdays"

** The following will work if you've told birthday tracker the year somebody was born **

- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker how old [name] is?"
- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker when [name] will be 40?"
- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker how old [name] will be in 2025"
- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker what day of the week [name] will be 21"

------------------------------------
Deleting a Birthday
------------------------------------

To delete a birthday say:

- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker to delete [name's] birthday"

------------------------------------
Updating a Birthday
------------------------------------

To update a birthday, say:

- "Alexa, ask birthday tracker to update [name's] birthday"

------------------------------------
Quick Add
------------------------------------

If you don't want to go through the "add birthday" flow each time you can say:

- "Alexa, tell birthday tracker [name's] birthday is on [date]"
or
- "Alexa, tell birthday tracker [name] was born on [date]"


------------------------------------
Account Linking
------------------------------------

You can create and link your birthday tracker from the Birthday Tracker skills page in the Alexa App. 

With a Birthday Tracker account you can create and manage all your birthdays online, plus get the added benefit of never losing your birthdays after you disable the skill.

You can sign in to your account at: https://birthday-tracker.com


------------------------------------
Birthday Tracker Premium
------------------------------------

Never miss a birthday again with Birthday Tracker premium! With Birthday Tracker Premium you can:

- Store an unlimited number of birthdays.
- Quickly and easily set reminders for your friends' and familys' birthdays, and you will be prompted to set another after they expire.
- Choose to receive E-mail notifications on the day of somebody's birthday and receive a run down of all upcoming birthdays each month. (Account linking required)

------------------------------------------

That's it! I hope you find the skill useful!
